snippet: A draft resolution would authorize the United Nations to send aid convoys across four specific border crossings, even without Syrian government consent, but only after United Nations monitors inspect what was loaded onto the trucks.
abstract: News analysis; potential showdown in United Nations Security Council over getting aid to millions of needy Syrians is measure of how difficult it is for world powers to agree on crisis in country, where Russia and West support opposing sides in the civil war.
lead_paragraph: A draft resolution would authorize the United Nations to send aid convoys across four specific border crossings, even without Syrian government consent, but only after United Nations monitors inspect what was loaded onto the trucks.

headline.main: Bid to Deliver Aid to Syria May Set Stage for a U.N. Clash
headline.print_headline: Bid to Deliver Aid to Syria May Set Stage for a U.N. Clash
